title: FSX  Cessna 441 Conquest  (here only)
description:
Most of the aircraft from FS2004 work fine in FSX. Sometimes it only takes correcting the alpha transparency. Other times it is a panel issue, because of older gauge incompatibilities or even licensing discrepancies with payware aircraft. Most publishers are too lazy to port over from 2004 or even SUPPORT existing FSX concatenations, F1 being a prime example. Take their C441 turboprop. An excellent plane and model, but, since motivation at F1 equals profit, let's remove the profit and see where that gets us...

Voila! Exclusively here at TPB, the Cessna 441 Conquest for FSX. Copy the gauges to your gauge folder, but don't bother overwriting any and place the Cessna 441 folder into your aircraft folder. Then seed to encourage more excellent uploads.

 Everything in this package came from TPB or the original FSX installation exclusively. It wouldn't have been possible without Papazoff, 4X-AXG, Flyer220, PCGamer08 and many, many others. Thank you all.

EDIT: Please download and install this torrent to enable all gauges:
     <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3883720/FS2004__amp__FSX_-_SimFlyer_-_Series_X_-_GPX-SX_(SR2)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3883720/FS2004__amp__FSX_-_SimFlyer_-_Series_X_-_GPX-SX_(SR2)</a>
